com.googlecode.aluminumproject.finders

Interface TemplateFinder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ConfigurationElement
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractTemplateFinder, ClassPathTemplateFinder, FileSystemTemplateFinder

    public interface TemplateFinder
extends ConfigurationElement
    Used by a parser to find a template by name.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      InputStream find(String name)
      Finds an input stream for a template with a certain name.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.googlecode.aluminumproject.configuration.ConfigurationElement

        disable, initialise

    • Method Detail

      • find

        InputStream find(String name)
                 throws AluminumException
        Finds an input stream for a template with a certain name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the template to find an input stream for
        Returns:
        an input stream where the template can be read from
        Throws:
        AluminumException - when no input stream can be found for the template
